Text:
With 3 good talk info shows like these, Mwlloy, Rhodes and Hartmann, we are very informed about real events. I thank you for posting and if you people can tell others, that is just as good as subing to their shows. If you cant pay for the shows, then help spread them around. 

Back in the early 1990s, this is how Rush Dittohead was helped to build listeners. Folks, righeing folks, passed around by post letter cassett copies, we have Dropbox and other tech now, USE IT
thanks wfmu.org. remember if you need a torrent reseeded, post it in the latest upload so that I may see it.
